project_plan.name: Command-Line Temperature Converter in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a command-line tool that converts temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin.

task.name: Implement conversion function for Celsius to Fahrenheit
Implement conversion function for Celsius to Kelvin
Implement conversion function for Fahrenheit to Celsius
Implement conversion function for Fahrenheit to Kelvin
Implement conversion function for Kelvin to Celsius
Implement conversion function for Kelvin to Fahrenheit
Create command-line interface to handle user input and output results
Write tests for each conversion function
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
